ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Seek out towns of races which can create wizards. (ie High Elf, Human, Gnome, Eudian, Dark Elf etc.) They all will have wizards guilds. going to Kelethin (Wood
ygData.messageBody:
Seek out towns of races which can create wizards. (ie High Elf, Human,
Gnome, Eudian, Dark Elf etc.) They all will have wizards guilds. going to
Kelethin (Wood Elf) or Kaladim (Dwarves) will not do any good because they
cant become wizards.


-----Original Message-----
From: Billy Sun <bsun@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, April 22, 1999 3:51 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Wizard Spell


>From: "Billy Sun" <bsun@...>
>
>I know that, but there are lvl 4 spells missing from there. I need to
>travel to another town to find it.

>Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Wizard Spell
